resources.string: Keyboard mode !\nPush BACK to switch to joystick
Joystick mode !\nPush BACK to switch to keyboard
Display virtual controls in landscape mode
Performance tweaking (smaller is better, but sound could be choppy)

Frodo Help


1. Useful shortcuts

- Back key = switch between joystick and keyboard mode (same as the menu item)

2. Physical Controls

D-Pad fire and moves are already supported. You can check the defaults value for physical keyb/joystick controls in the Settings menu, you can also change them.


3. Disk loading

D64 and PRG files are supported. PRG files are directly loaded and launched, while you can choose a specific program of the
D64 disk image (or load the disk 'as is', i.e. launching the first entry found), or choose a snapshot if you previously saved one.
You will then see a LOAD"*",8,1, followed by a RUN. If you got a "File Not Found" error, it's likely you selected the wrong program in the D64 browser view.
Try the entry #2, #3, etc.


4. Program launch

When loaded, and program intro is running, C64 programs can be tricky to start. Sometimes it's the space bar, sometimes it's the "Run/Stop" button, 
sometimes it's the joystick fire (port 1 or port 2, be aware that a few programs does not support both ports).


5. Compatibility

This build of Frodo have a good compatibility but some programs can be troublesome to run. Here's some hints:
- If the program seems stuck during the loading step, it could be a basic emulation issue. Try to enable "1541 emulation" option. it's much slower
to load, but you could have some good results.
- If you have some sort of graphical corruption at start or during the play, it's likely a cycle emulation issue. You can change the precise cycles option (restart), but no guarantee here.


6. Performance

With sound enabled, on a standard Android device, a frame skip value of 3, maybe 2 is ok to have a good C64 experience.
Without the sound, you can set this to 1 to achieve more than 40 fps without much hiccups !



Enjoy !
Required for a few programs (especially if bad things happens during the loading time)
A state file of this disk image exists. Do you want to run it or have a fresh start?
Change default mapping for important controls
A little slower but better compatibility (need restart)
Alternative layout, much playable, but where you can hide parts of the screen with your fingers
Enable old touch joystick (new one may cause perf issues on old devices ?)
